pgTitle: List of Medal of Honor recipients for the Vietnam War

rows.text: Error: 1971 May 25 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Killed while flying his helicopter in a rescue mission
Error: 1966 December 1 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
After participating in the defeat of an enemy assault he was killed in hand-to-hand combat
Error: 1967 February 28 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For covering an enemy grenade with his body to protect fellow Marines
Error: 1969 August 24 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For covering an enemy grenade with his body to protect fellow Marines on a recon mission.
Error: 1967 October 15 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Although wounded multiple times he continued to fight and refused medical aid until the enemy attack was over

Error: 1968 February 6 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. – Error: 1968 February 7 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Risked his life attempting to save the lives of his entrapped comrades and commanding officer
Error: 1969 February 23 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Threw himself between enemy fire and an injured fellow Marine
Error: 1970 February 10 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Covered a grenade with his helmet and body, saving eight men
Error: 1968 August 26 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Risked his life by repeatedly leading groups of men in fighting back an enemy attack
Error: 1966 November 5 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
He was directly responsible for saving the lives of several of his comrades, and inflicting serious damage on the enemy.
Error: 1968 May 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Risked his life by smothering a grenade with his own body
Error: 1967 September 21 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Threw himself on a grenade to save fellow Marines
Error: 1967 November 12 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life by throwing himself directly onto a hand grenade as it exploded.
Error: 1965 December 18 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Assumed command of a rifle company upon death of the commander in an ambush, directed the counterattack
Error: 1970 April 1 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Endured hostile gunfire and serious injuries to save several wounded soldiers
Error: 1966 November 19 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1967 May 20 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1968 May 2 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For a series of daring and valorous actions despite severe wounds
Error: 1972 June 29 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life to save the life of his passenger

Error: 1969 February 9 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. – Error: 1969 February 11 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For saving many lives as a medic during a number of vicious firefights. Second conscientious objector to receive the Medal of Honor.
Error: 1969 July 3 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1967 March 30 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Held his position in the face of enemy ambush despite having his lower leg blown off allowing the remainder of his outnumbered unit to move to safety
Error: 1969 May 24 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
He destroyed 10 enemy bunkers and accounted for a large toll of the enemy, including two key enemy commanders
Error: 1969 June 27 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1968 January 6 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Flew multiple missions against heavy fire to evacuate 51 wounded men
Error: 1969 March 1 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Carried an explosive device away from three other Marines
Error: 1969 March 24 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Showed conspicuous leadership while organizing his unit's defense during a 34-hour enemy attack

Error: 1968 March 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. – Error: 1968 March 19 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Led his company in the decimation of a superior enemy force which left 156 dead on the battlefield
Error: 1970 April 5 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life to lead his men against the enemy and personally destroyed two enemy bunkers with hand grenades
Error: 1968 May 17 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
After his unit was ambushed, he assaulted the enemy forces, allowing the remainder of the unit to recover wounded and continue their advance
Error: 1967 September 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
A Chaplain who was killed while attempting to rescue a wounded corpsman
Error: 1968 July 28 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Was killed while providing medical attention to several wounded Marines
Error: 1969 August 7 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life to save several Marines by smothering a grenade with his body

Error: 1971 June 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. – Error: 1971 June 5 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Risked his life by attacking a wave of enemy forces alone to allow the rest of his platoon to escape
Error: 1970 January 31 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Risked his life to rescue several Marines and corpsman from a minefield
Error: 1969 March 24 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For assaulting an enemy position and aiding a fallen Marine despite severe wounds to himself
Error: 1966 February 25 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For absorbing the blast of a malfunctioning grenade in order to protect his fellow Marines

Error: 1964 December 31 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. – Error: 1967 December 8 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For assisting fellow prisoners while a prisoner of war
Error: 1965 November 14 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For repeatedly flying into a landing zone under intense enemy fire to rescue and resupply ground troops
Error: 1969 February 13 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life to save five Marines by smothering a grenade with his body
Error: 1968 November 20 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For single-handedly destroying two bunkers while under fire from a third machine gun during an ambush
Error: 1968 March 2 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

Maintained his position, refused assistance, and provided defensive fire for his comrades until he fell mortally wounded. He was solely responsible for killing 15 enemy soldiers while saving the lives of at least nine members of his own unit.
Error: 1971 February 23 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1967 September 6 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life to save several of his fellow Marines by smothering a grenade with his body
Error: 1967 November 18 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For defending his 42-man unit from hundreds of attacking Viet Cong
Error: 1967 August 26 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For actions as a prisoner of war from August 26, 1967–March 4, 1973
Emilio A. De La Garza, Jr.
Error: 1970 April 11 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life and saved several Marines by blocking them from the blast of a grenade
Error: 1967 March 10 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Flew repeated close range strikes to silence enemy defensive positions, ignoring overwhelming firepower and damage to his own aircraft
Error: 1968 March 17 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life to draw the enemy fire upon himself allowing a trapped squad to rejoin their platoon
Error: 1969 November 12 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Although severely wounded multiple times by enemy fire he continued to throw grenades at an enemy bunker until it was destroyed and he was killed by enemy gunfire.
Error: 1967 March 26 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life to save several fellow Marines by diving on a grenade and absorbing the explosion with his body

Error: 1968 January 31 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. – Error: 1968 February 1 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
His actions resulted in 14 confirmed Viet Cong killed in action and possibly 25 more, the capture of 20 prisoners, 15 weapons, and the rescue of the 14 United States and free world civilians
Error: 1969 March 25 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Although already wounded, he sacrificed his life to save other soldiers who were pinned down by silencing two enemy gun emplacements and diving into a third with a grenade.
Error: 1966 May 21 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For silencing three enemy positions and rescuing several wounded comrades
Error: 1964 July 6 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Rescued and administered first aid to several wounded soldiers and led a group to defeat an enemy force causing them to retreat leaving behind 54 of their dead, many weapons, and grenades.
Error: 1969 May 13 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Although wounded he directed fire onto enemy positions and rescued several wounded soldiers
Error: 1967 October 17 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Although wounded he directed fire on enemy positions and continued to fight until he died from his wounds
Error: 1970 September 7 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Was killed while attempting to rescue a wounded soldier from a personnel carrier

Error: 1967 April 20 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. and Error: 1967 April 26 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Risked his life by attacking an enemy SAM site and other enemy targets multiple times
Error: 1968 March 11 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

Exposed himself to enemy fire in order to place his three surviving wounded comrades in rescue slings permitting them to be airlifted to safety. It took an act of Congress for Etchberger to be reconsidered for this 2010 Medal of Honor, since the existence of Lima Site 85 had to be kept secret in 1968.
Error: 1967 January 27 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Evans Army Community Hospital, Ft Carson, was named after Evans. Was a medic who was killed while treating and rescuing members of his unit.
Error: 1969 July 18 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Killed protecting others during an ambush
Error: 1968 January 31 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Risked his life by flying his helicopter into heavy enemy fire to evacuate several wounded passengers and aircrew of a downed helicopter
Error: 1966 February 18 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Threw himself on an enemy grenade as it exploded, saving the lives of four comrades at the sacrifice of his life
Error: 1966 March 10 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For rescuing a downed airman despite heavy fire
Error: 1971 March 23 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For absorbing an explosive charge and continuing to fight with weapons and hand to hand before successfully defending a bunker.
Error: 1969 May 27 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1968 November 26 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For the rescue of a six-man special forces unit
Error: 1966 November 5 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

Despite his painful wounds he refused medical aid and persevered in the forefront of the attack on the enemy redoubt. He led the assault on several enemy gun emplacements and, single-handedly, destroyed three such positions.
Error: 1969 July 3 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life by smothering a grenade with his body
Error: 1967 October 14 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life by smothering a grenade with his body
Error: 1968 May 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life in an attempt to defuse a claymore mine
Error: 1968 May 14 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1969 February 22 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Although wounded he directed fire on the enemy and led his platoon to drive the enemy back
Error: 1970 August 19 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him.
Error: 1965 November 14 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Error: 1969 January 11 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Despite his wounds he returned to his position, assisted his men, and refused medical attention until all of his wounded comrades had been treated and evacuated
Error: 1966 February 7 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life by single-handedly destroying several enemy gun positions until he was killed

Error: 1969 July 15 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. – Error: 1969 July 19 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For providing covering fire for a medic working on a wounded soldier
Error: 1968 February 4 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Although seriously wounded he destroyed an enemy bunker and fought back an enemy attack until he was killed
Error: 1967 June 2 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

After fighting off the enemy he sacrificed his life allowing the rest of his company to return to friendly lines while he remained alone with an injured soldier who could not be moved due to his wounds.
Error: 1967 May 18 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Fought off an enemy attack until killed by an enemy rocket
Error: 1966 November 13 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Killed by enemy mortar fire while attempting to rescue several injured Marines
Error: 1968 February 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For courageous leadership on an eight man Marine recon patrol
Error: 1968 May 18 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life by smothering a grenade with his body
Error: 1967 March 20 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Risked his life to render medical aid to several injured soldiers and protected them until they could be evacuated
Error: 1971 August 7 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Error: 1969 February 23 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering an explosion with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1967 June 21 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life and attacked a group of enemy soldiers so that several injured members of his squad could escape
Error: 1968 June 29 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Risked his life to protect several wounded soldiers by smothering a grenade with his body
Error: 1966 March 5 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life to eliminate two companies of the enemy, rescue a fellow soldier and destroyed the starlight scope attached to his rifle to prevent its capture and use by the Viet Cong.
Error: 1968 December 3 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Risked his life to lead his men to fight back an attacking enemy force three times
Error: 1968 February 21 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

Repeatedly risked his life to rescue wounded soldiers and attack groups of enemy soldiers, clearing multiple bunkers and houses sometimes single-handed. Refused medical treatment or evacuation until after action and his men were settled. Most decorated soldier during Vietnam War. Arguably the most decorated U.S. Army soldier in history (counting only U.S. citations).
Error: 1967 March 21 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1966 June 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Repeateadly repulsed enemy attacks and although severely wounded was able maintain control of his unit until help could arrive
Error: 1968 December 30 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For actions during a rescue mission in enemy territory
Error: 1970 May 6 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1967 April 16 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1966 March 28 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Although badly wounded he continued to assist and treat the injuries of the Marines around him who had been hurt in combat with the enemy
Error: 1968 May 12 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For a daring airborne rescue of American special forces troops
Error: 1968 March 9 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Drove off squads of enemy soldiers on three occasions who were searching for allied wounded and weapons. He killed three and wounding several others
Error: 1969 January 6 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Repeatedly attacked the enemy and although severely wounded risked his life to rescue several wounded soldiers
Error: 1969 March 5 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For using his body to shield a fellow Marine from a grenade blast
Error: 1966 December 27 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Repeatedly attacked and defended his unit from enemy fire and assisted 8 wounded men who were trapped behind enemy lines
Error: 1969 August 28 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Killed while attacking a group of enemy soldiers
Error: 1965 November 8 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Error: 1968 January 15 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Repeatedly exposed himself to enemy fire to man several different machine-guns until the enemy had been fought back
Error: 1968 March 5 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1969 March 21 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering explosive blasts with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1968 September 1 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Risked his life to fly his heavily damaged plane back to base to relay the location of a downed pilot
Error: 1967 March 12 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life to save other soldiers by smothering a grenade with his body
Error: 1969 March 20 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering an explosive blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1970 May 7 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Risked his life to assist several fallen comrades and although injured in the attempt was able to administer first aid to himself and several of the wounded and helped them to safety.
Error: 1968 June 13 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For letting a Vietnamese soldier take his spot in a helicopter rescue, while he stayed behind to attempt to hold off advancing Viet Cong by which he was overrun.
Error: 1970 May 8 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life to single-handedly eliminate a group of enemy soldiers
Error: 1967 May 2 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Assaulted an enemy platoon with another soldier preventing further casualties
Error: 1969 June 15 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Successfully relayed commands through one of his men until an enemy attack was silenced and the boats he was leading were able to move to safety
Error: 1970 March 11 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1969 March 14 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Error: 1968 February 6 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1968 August 20 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For taking command of his platoon and exposing himself to enemy fire to reestablish communication, tend to wounded men, and continued fighting
Error: 1969 February 22 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For destroying three enemy bunkers with grenades and rifle fire, helping to secure an enemy supply cache and directing his men after being seriously wounded.
Error: 1969 January 15 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him
Error: 1969 June 2 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life by using his own body as a shield in an attempt to save a wounded soldier
Error: 1968 June 19 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For the rescue of two downed naval aviators
Error: 1966 September 21 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Rushed an enemy machine gun to distract the enemy so that his wounded comrades could be moved to safety
Error: 1969 February 22 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
For smothering a grenade blast with his body to protect those around him

Error: 1966 August 8 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input. – Error: 1966 August 9 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

Volunteered to reinforce squad of Marines who were under heavy fire. He assumed command and directed the defense of their position and despite being wounded by a grenade, he continued to direct them, saving many lives.
Error: 1968 April 26 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Exposed himself to enemy fire and overran an enemy squad continuing to provide cover fire until the lead element had overrun a second enemy squad and he fell mortally wounded.
Error: 1969 December 2 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
Sacrificed his life to shield another soldier from a rocket blast, absorbing the full blast with his body. He continued to direct his men and refused treatment until his men were taken care of.
Error: 1970 April 1 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

The only Canadian recipient since World War II, and one of only four since 1900. He received it for exposing himself to enemy gunfire multiple times. While wounded he secured a machine gun and fired on the enemy refusing evacuation until his injured comrades were taken.
Error: 1967 February 28 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.

After being shot in the hand by a sniper he exposed himself to enemy gunfire and charged a machine gun, killing the enemy there. He was shot multiple times and propped himself up against a tree and continued to fire until he succumbed to his injuries.
Error: 1969 February 24 This is not an acceptable date format. Please check the spelling, check the numbers and/or read the documentation at template for correct date input.
